text: aur jab tum ne kaha aye Moosa! hum se ek hee qism ke khaane par hargiz sabr na ho sakega, is liye apne rub se dua ki jiye ke wo hamein zameen ki paidawaar saag, kakdi, gyaho, masoor aur pyaaz de, aap ne farmaaya, behtar cheez ke badhle adna cheez kyo talab karte ho! accha shaher mein jaao waha tumhaari chaahath ki ye sub cheeze milengi, un par zillath wa maskani daal di gayi aur Allah ka ghazab le kar wo laute, ye is liye ke wo Allah taâ€™ala ki ayato ke saath kufr karte thein aur nabiyo ko na haq qatal karte thein, ye un ki na farmaaniyo aur zyaadatiyo ka natija hai
